Class BaseServiceModificationCommand

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CliCommand, CliCommandPlugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServiceCreateCommand, ServiceEditCommand
    public abstract class BaseServiceModificationCommand
extends BaseServiceCommand
    Base class with methods to modify beans dynamically using FieldEditor.
    Version:
    $Id: BaseServiceModificationCommand.java 23457 2016-05-16 17:18:31Z mikekushner $

    • Method Detail

      • modifyFromArgs

        protected boolean modifyFromArgs​(ServiceConfiguration serviceConfig,
                                 String[] args)
        Modifies the fields in the given ServiceConfiguration from command-line arguments. The syntax is: servicename [-listFields|-listProperties] fieldOrProperty=value... This method handles the -list arguments as well, which show which fields and properties can be set.
        Parameters:
        serviceConfig - Cinfig
        args - Args
        Returns:
        Bool

      • modify

        protected boolean modify​(ServiceConfiguration serviceConfig,
                         FieldEditor fieldEditor,
                         String field,
                         String value)
        Modifies a given field or property in a ServiceConfiguration, using the a FieldEditor. First it tries to find a field with the given name, then it tries with the worker/interval/action properties.
        Parameters:
        serviceConfig - Config
        fieldEditor - Editor
        field - Field
        value - Value
        Returns:
        bool

      • handleListOptions

        protected boolean handleListOptions​(ServiceConfiguration serviceConfig,
                                    ParameterContainer parameters,
                                    String command)
        Handles the -listFields and -listProperties options.
        Parameters:
        serviceConfig - Cinfig
        parameters - Params
        command - Command
        Returns:
        bool
